Class UserUI

java.lang.Object
boundary.UserUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthenticationUI, FilterManagementUI, MainMenuUI, NotificationUI, ProfileManagementUI
public class UserUI extends Object implements AuthenticationUI, ProfileManagementUI, FilterManagementUI, MainMenuUI, NotificationUI
The UserUI class serves as the command-line interface for general users, handling login, profile management, filter settings, main menu display, and notification displays for all roles in the BTO Management System. Interfaces implemented: - AuthenticationUI - ProfileManagementUI - FilterManagementUI - MainMenuUI - NotificationUI

  • Constructor Details

    • UserUI

      public UserUI(AuthenticationController authController, FilterController filterController, ApplicationController applicationController, ProjectController projectController, EnquiryController enquiryController)
      Constructs a UserUI with the necessary controllers.
      Parameters:
      authController - controller for handling user authentication
      filterController - controller for managing filter settings
      applicationController - controller for application tracking and status
      projectController - controller for project-related queries
      enquiryController - controller for enquiry status checks

      Specified by:

      Returns:

      Allows users to change their account password.
